guide.conclusion: some of the parts like the CD's can be at your home, so start recycling to make a turbot!

guide.introduction: turbots can be awesome because they have long legs that can help the turbots to avoid obstacles without the touch sensor and has 4 light sensors that help the turbot seek light! That's why I'm showing you how to make a turbot, with NO soldering!
guide.introduction_rendered:
turbots can be awesome because they have long legs that can help the turbots to avoid obstacles without the touch sensor and has 4 light sensors that help the turbot seek light! That's why I'm showing you how to make a turbot, with NO soldering!

Relevant parts
  • Transistor PN 2222 from solarbotics
  • IC chip 74AC240 from solarbotics
  • Gear Motor 4 - Clear Servo from solarbotics
  • 47k Resistor from solarbotics
  • Infrared Optical Sensor from solarbotics
  • 17 X 10 breadboard from solarbotics
  • CDs from a DvD
  • 1.0k Resistor from solarbotics
  • metal hanger or stick
Tools
  • super glue gel

parts.text: Gear Motor 4 - Clear Servo from solarbotics

guide.summary:
this guide will accomplish you to build the turbots
in electronic components and 1 IC chip from Solarbotics.com.
guide.title: MAKE: turbots!
